医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
国际合作揭示全球肥胖率惊人上升根据《柳叶刀》发表的一项全球分析，全球患有肥胖症的儿童、青少年和成人总数已超过 10 亿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240303/International-collaboration-reveals-alarming-rise-in-global-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240303/International-collaboration-reveals-alarming-rise-in-global-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cacc99d8-bed5-42bd-b343-0798dcef85bb Sun, 03 Mar 2024 11:31:35 -0500 International collaboration reveals alarming rise in global obesity
孟德尔随机化研究中优先考虑生物动机方法孟德尔随机化是医学研究中的一个强大工具，可以帮助我们了解某些因素是否真正导致疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Prioritizing-biologically-motivated-approaches-in-Mendelian-randomization-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Prioritizing-biologically-motivated-approaches-in-Mendelian-randomization-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=192b7d1d-ab11-4c99-931c-bc30f69fce90 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 23:38:37 -0500 Prioritizing biologically motivated approaches in Mendelian randomization studies
微生物特征与癌症免疫治疗反应相关微生物组可以识别那些受益于多种不同癌症的联合免疫疗法的患者，包括罕见的妇科癌症、胆道癌和黑色素瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Microbial-signatures-linked-to-immunotherapy-response-across-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Microbial-signatures-linked-to-immunotherapy-response-across-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05e7fb81-0435-4312-98e0-236b9a56c7a9 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 21:47:34 -0500 Microbial signatures linked to immunotherapy response across cancers
研究发现，只有 9% 的美国老年人接种了 RSV 疫苗德克萨斯农工大学公共卫生学院的一项新研究发现，尽管全国范围内的住院率和死亡率面临着增加的威胁，但在今年秋冬之前，只有 9% 的美国老年人接种了呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 疫苗。病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/OOnly-925-of-older-Americans-vaccinated-against-RSV-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/OOnly-925-of-older-Americans-vaccinated-against-RSV-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a8bb886-8918-4123-9aab-97ef8b6b136a Fri, 01 Mar 2024 18:45:00 -0500 Only 9% of older Americans vaccinated against RSV, study finds
研究揭示了社会经济地位对研究环境中儿童焦虑的影响加州大学河滨分校领导的一项研究表明，在参与研究时，来自少数群体的中度焦虑或高度焦虑的儿童可能会对威胁保持高度警惕，从而进一步加剧他们普遍焦虑状态的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Study-reveals-impact-of-socioeconomic-status-on-childrens-anxiety-in-research-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Study-reveals-impact-of-socioeconomic-status-on-childrens-anxiety-in-research-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2aa6b71-7420-4ca4-8549-2aa29d23e438 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 17:25:00 -0500 Study reveals impact of socioeconomic status on children's anxiety in research settings
创新的涂层解决方案可提高卫生状况并减少食品储存中的腐蚀为了改善食品工业，化学工程教授 Mustafa Akbulut 博士和园艺科学教授 Luis Cisneros-Zevallos 博士开发了一种用于镀锌钢的两步涂层解决方案，该解决方案更加卫生，并减少了腐蚀的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Innovative-coating-solution-enhances-hygiene-and-reduces-corrosion-in-food-storage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Innovative-coating-solution-enhances-hygiene-and-reduces-corrosion-in-food-storage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af1627f5-f19f-457a-9acb-5fd85c063e14 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 16:50:00 -0500 Innovative coating solution enhances hygiene and reduces corrosion in food storage
发现肠道细菌四环素耐药性的新遗传机制抗生素耐药性是全世界一个重要且日益严重的医学问题。海洋生物实验室（MBL）的研究人员和合作者发现了一种新的基因排列，可能有助于人类肠道中的常见细菌脆弱拟杆菌保护自身免受四环素（一种广泛使用的抗生素）的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Novel-genic-mechanisms-of-tetracycline-resistance-in-gut-bacteria-discovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Novel-genic-mechanisms-of-tetracycline-resistance-in-gut-bacteria-discovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17ea03a4-177a-4182-8366-4d9210939acb Fri, 01 Mar 2024 16:42:00 -0500 Novel genetic mechanisms of tetracycline resistance in gut bacteria discovered
探索吸烟对不同种族和族裔群体的表观遗传影响吸烟会改变基因的表达方式，从而导致肺癌和其他与吸烟有关的疾病的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Exploring-the-epigenic-impact-of-smoking-across-racial-and-ethnic-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Exploring-the-epigenic-impact-of-smoking-across-racial-and-ethnic-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b247fa8-e066-44d6-b059-a6e1a70b8687 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 16:33:00 -0500 Exploring the epigenetic impact of smoking across racial and ethnic groups
解开滤泡辅助 T 细胞的秘密，以制定更好的治疗策略滤泡辅助 T 细胞 (Tfh) 对于感染和疫苗接种过程中免疫系统产生的强烈抗体介导反应至关重要。然而，如果它们失控，可能会导致自身免疫、过敏或癌症等疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Unlocking-the-secrets-of-T-follillary-helper-cells-for-better-treatment-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Unlocking-the-secrets-of-T-follillary-helper-cells-for-better-treatment-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c50c413-fff5-4a59-8998-8f551758019e Fri, 01 Mar 2024 16:24:00 -0500 Unlocking the secrets of T follicular helper cells for better treatment strategies
神经过度生长被认为是复发性尿路感染疼痛的原因对于复发性尿路感染 (UTI) 患者来说，一个令人困惑的问题是持续疼痛，即使抗生素已成功清除细菌后也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Nerve-overgrowth-identified-as-cause-of-pain-in-recurring-UTIs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Nerve-overgrowth-identified-as-cause-of-pain-in-recurring-UTIs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b205e2d-c7fd-4259-9322-e1e1ff4e0447 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 16:15:00 -0500 Nerve overgrowth identified as cause of pain in recurring UTIs
